attributes.action: either stop reducing interest rates or make it ILLEGAL for banks, etc., not to pass the FULL reduction on to customers IMMEDIATELY!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Interest rate cuts, as I understand things, are intended to boost people's spending and therefore the economy; but how can this happen if the banks don't pass them on?  As someone with some savings I am obviously losing out through these cuts but if they're not passed on to borrowers I'm losing out for nothing!
